text: Olivone was a municipality of the district Blenio in the canton of Ticino in Switzerland. In 2005, the people in charge of the cantons said that Olivone would merge with 4 other villages to become a new municipality of Blenio.Amtliches Gemeindeverzeichnis der Schweiz published by the Swiss Federal Statistical Office accessed 14 January 2010 == References == ==Other websites== * Official website Category:Former municipalities of Ticino Category:2006 disestablishments in Switzerland
title: Olivone
